Company: Adult and Child Care Center, Choices, Inc., Diversified Support Services, Midtown Mental Health Center
Description of incident: A hacking incident that occurred on or around May 10 may have exposed the protected health information of patients.  The incident was reported by HHS on July 27.UPDATE (08/16/2012): A total of 505 clients and family members of clients of Diversified Support Services and 890 clients and family members of clients of Midtown Mental Health Center were affected.  Social Security numbers, private health information, and demographic information were exposed.
